author: jmitchell
msg: move build/legacy to core/build-legacy, it is just getting too big to be shared via externals

author: kylem
msg: Added support for localization of strings specified via BeanInfo (org.apache.beehive.controls.api.packaging.*) annotations.  A string annotation value can have the form "%<resource-specifier>%" and the value will be pulled from a resource bundle.  The <resource-specifier> string is a base resource bundle name (which will be customized based upon the default locale) concatenated with a resource name inside the bundle, seperated by '.'.   Generated BeanInfo classes will dynamically pull the string value from the resource bundle, enabling BeanInfo attributes (name, displayName, shortDescription, etc) to be customized for different locales.  The beaninfo test in the Controls checkin test set includes a sample usage.

author: dolander
msg: Jira 273 -- Inside a template content page, you cannot set the documentType
The result is that a page may be a mix of XHTML and HTML.  This will fix that
problem by allowing the content page to set the documentType overriding anything
set on the html tag in the template.
This is an empty revision for padding.
